name: Wild Arms: Million Memories
storyline:
"The ruined planet, Filgaia.

Ashley, Virginia, Jude, Dean, and Clarissa—adventurers known as “Migrant Birds”—were in trouble due to Mother, the leader of the Metal Demons.

Are they not able to stop mother’s plan? Will they have to accept their fate of despair?

Mother’s crazy laughter echoes.

Countermeasures against the worst possible situation should have been devised, and yet such a situation is occurring...

"Why did you betray everyone? Rudy..."

Fates will cross, and feelings will connect—-."
summary:
A new game in the Wild Arms series designed for mobile devices.

The game does not have many details announced yet but is expected this year in Japan and Akifumi Kaneko, who worked on the original games, is supervising.

The development team is trying to create a new story that won't destroy the memories of the original Wild Arms games and the title, Million Memories, is to reflect on the many memories of the staff and players that grew up wth the games.
